name: UAA International, Inc
about: UAA International, Inc., operating as Universal Air Academy, is a renowned flight training institution based in La Verne, California. With over 20 years of experience, we provide professional flight training for aspiring pilots, whether they aim for a career in aviation or simply want to fly as a hobby. Our training is based on FAA-approved syllabi, ensuring students receive comprehensive and safe instruction. We offer one-on-one training with a fleet of over 15 aircraft, including airplanes and helicopters, all maintained to FAA standards. Our instructors are highly trained and committed to each student's success, often going above and beyond to ensure their goals are met. We have a strong track record of placing graduates in top aviation companies worldwide. At UAA International, Inc., we are dedicated to guiding our students to become skilled and safe pilots, making their dreams of flying a reality.
